I Know <WG1492> <WG3588> <WG2041> Thy Works, <WG4675> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Labour <WG2873> Thy, <WG4675> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Endurance <WG5281>, Thy, <WG4675> And <WG2532> That <WG3754> <WG3756> Thou Canst Not <WG1410> Bear <WG941> Evil Ones; <WG2556> And <WG2532> Thou Didst Try <WG3985> Those Who <WG3588> Declare Themselves <WG5335> To Be <WG1511> Apostles <WG652> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Are Not <WG1526> And <WG2532> Didst Find <WG2147> Them <WG846> Liars; <WG5571>

And <WG2532> Didst Bear <WG941> And <WG2532> Endurance <WG5281> Hast, <WG2192> And <WG2532> For The Sake Of <WG1223> <WG3588> <WG3686> My Name <WG3450> Hast Laboured <WG2872> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Hast Not Wearied : <WG2577>
' But <WG235> I Have <WG2192> Against <WG2596> Thee, <WG4675> That <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG26> Thy Love <WG4675> Thy <WG3588> First <WG4413> Thou Didst Leave. <WG863>

Remember <WG3421> Therefore <WG3767> Whence <WG4159>, Thou Hast Fallen From, <WG1601> And <WG2532> Repent, <WG3340> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> First <WG4413> Works <WG2041> Do : <WG4160> <WG1487> But If <WG1161> Not, <WG3361> I Am Coming <WG2064> To Thee <WG4671> Quickly, <WG5034> And <WG2532> I Will Remove <WG2795> <WG3588> <WG3087> Thy Lampstand <WG4675> Out Of <WG1537> Its, <WG3588> Place <WG5117> Its <WG846> Except <WG1437> Thou <WG3361> Shouldest Repent. <WG3340>

Not At All <WG3367> Fear <WG5399> The Things Which <WG3739> Thou Are About <WG3195> To Suffer. <WG3958>, Lo, <WG2400> Is About <WG3195> To Cast Some <WG906> Of <WG1537> You <WG5216> The <WG3588> Devil <WG1228> Into <WG1519> Prison, <WG5438> That <WG2443> Ye May Be Tried; <WG3985> And <WG2532> Ye Shall Have <WG2192> Tribulation <WG2347> Days <WG2250> Ten. <WG1176> Be Thou <WG1096> Faithful <WG4103> Unto <WG891> Death, <WG2288> And <WG2532> I Will Give <WG1325> To Thee <WG4671> The <WG3588> Crown <WG4735> <WG3588> Of Life. <WG2222>

I Know <WG1492> <WG3588> <WG2041>, Thy Works <WG4675> And <WG2532> Where <WG4226> Thou Dwellest, <WG2730> Where <WG3699> The <WG3588> Throne <WG2362> <WG3588> Of Satan Is <WG4567> And <WG2532> Thou Holdest Fast <WG2902> <WG3588> <WG3686> My Name, <WG3450> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Didst Deny <WG720> <WG3588> <WG4102> My Faith <WG3450> Even <WG2532> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Days <WG2250> In <WG1722> Which <WG3739> Antipas <WG493> <WG3588> <WG3144> My Witness <WG3450> The <WG3588> Faithful Was, <WG4103> Who <WG3739> Was Killed <WG615> ' Among <WG3844> You, <WG5213> Where <WG3699> Dwells <WG2730> The <WG3588> Satan. <WG4567>

' But <WG235> I Have <WG2192> Against <WG2596> Thee <WG4675> A Few Things; <WG3641> Because <WG3754> Thou Hast <WG2192> There Those <WG1563> Holding <WG2902> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> Of Balaam, <WG903> Who <WG3739> <WG1321> Taught <WG1722> <WG3588> Balak <WG904> To Cast <WG906> A Snare <WG4625> Before <WG1799> The <WG3588> Sons <WG5207> Of Israel, <WG2474> To Eat <WG5315> Things Sacrificed To Idols <WG1494> And <WG2532> To Commit Fornication. <WG4203>
So <WG3779> Hast <WG2192> Also <WG2532> Thou Those <WG4771> Holding <WG2902> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> Of The <WG3588> Nicolaitans, <WG3531> Which Thing <WG3739> I Hate. <WG3404>

Repent! <WG3340> <WG1487> <WG1161> But If Not, <WG3361> I Am Coming <WG2064> To Thee <WG4671> Quickly, <WG5035> And <WG2532> Will Make War <WG4170> ' With <WG3326> Them <WG846> With <WG1722> The <WG3588> Sword <WG4501> The <WG3588> <WG4750> Of My Mouth. <WG3450>

And <WG2532> I Gave <WG1325> Her <WG846> Time <WG5550> That <WG2443> She Might Repent <WG3340> Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG4202> Her Fornication; <WG846> And <WG2532> <WG3756> She Repented Not. <WG3340>

Lo, <WG2400> I 1473 P-1NS Cast 906 V-PAI-1S Her 846 P-ASF Into 1519 PREP A Bed, 2825 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ Those Who 3588 T-APM Commit Adultery 3431 V-PAP-APM ' With 3326 PREP Her 846 P-GSF Into 1519 PREP Tribulation 2347 N-ASF Great, 3173 A-ASF 1437 COND Except 3361 PRT-N They Should Repent 3340 V-AAS-3P Of 1537 PREP 3588 T-GPN Works 2041 N-GPN Their. 846 P-GPM

And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG5043> Her Children <WG846> I Will Kill <WG615> With <WG1722> Death; <WG2288> And <WG2532> Shall Know <WG1097> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Assemblies <WG1577> That <WG3754> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S He Who 3588 T-NSM Searches 2045 V-PAP-NSM Reins 3510 N-APM And 2532 CONJ Hearts; 2588 N-APF And 2532 CONJ I Will Give 1325 V-FAI-1S To You 5213 P-2DP Each 1538 A-DSM According 2596 PREP To 3588 T-APN Works 2041 N-APN Your. 5216 P-2GP

<WG5213> But To You <WG1161> I Say, <WG3004> And <WG2532> To The Rest <WG3062> Who Are <WG3588> In <WG1722> Thyatira, <WG2363> As Many As <WG3745> <WG3756> Have Not <WG2192> <WG3588> <WG1322> This Teaching, <WG3778> And <WG2532> Who <WG3748> <WG3756> Knew Not <WG1097> The <WG3588> Depths <WG899> <WG3588> Of Satan, <WG4567> As <WG5613> They Say; <WG3004> Not <WG3756> I Will Cast <WG906> ' Upon <WG1909> You <WG5209> Any Other <WG243> Burden; <WG922>
But <WG4133> What <WG3739> Ye Have <WG2192> Holdfast <WG2902> Till <WG891> <WG3739> <WG302> I Shall Come. <WG2240>
